document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Brossfeather Villa on Anteos Lane.
document_data.name: Brossfeather Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Brossfeather Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Brossfeather]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located in the north section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] where [[Anteos Lane]] met [[Brassfeather Lane]] just north of [[Whaelgond Way]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: The villa contained four separate buildings arranged around a central garden. The buildings stood two or three stories tall.
